The following test checks to see if a known OSM way in Leeds, a footpath in Leeds in a path on which cycling is allowed and is common, is correctly identified.

```{r}
leeds = get_travel_network("Leeds")
potternewton_path = leeds |>
  filter(osm_id == 306849934)
potternewton_cycling = get_cycling_network(potternewton_path)
nrow(potternewton_cycling)
```
